name: Forbindelse (2022)
description:
A co-op game where you must explore a wintery forest. 

Stay together to stay warm (health goes up), but separate to explore faster at the cost of warmth (health goes down). 

Find items to increase your maximum health, and simply explore and enjoy each other's warm company.

Made in 48 hours for Kiwijam 2022.

CONTROLS
-Press any button on a controller to have a player join
-Move with WASD / Analog
-Quit: Alt + F4 (Windows) or Cmd + Q (Mac)

CREDITS
-Adam Thompson
-Cameron Chung
-Joe Chang
